title: Spencer Pratt on Amber Heard, her Friends and the Selling Sunset’s Producer
description:
Spencer Pratt is here and he has been watching the Johnny Depp trial uninterrupted for weeks. Heather and Spencer deep dive into the trial updates and give their predictions on who they think will prevail. They also get into a juicy liable case that is happening between two soccer players’ wives. The Christley Family is in the midst of a tax evasion case right now and things are not looking good. Kim Kardashian is on the cover of Sports Illustrated. Julia Fox is shopping in her panties, using her pants as a purse. Lisa and Lenny from Real Housewives of Miami are getting divorced and Spencer has some inside scoop about Dr. Lenny’s new lover. Sutton Stracke from Real Housewives of Beverly Hills has receipts proving Rinna wrong and more. Enjoy! 

Subscribe on Apple Podcasts to get exclusive Extra Juicy episodes every Friday and get all episodes of Juicy Scoop, ad-free

Or get access to Extra Juicy on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/juicyscoop
